title: How do I change to another email account？
answer:
1、To add another email account:  
      Touch Email, press![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/0-111115142019.PNG) , touch Accounts, press![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/0-111115142034.PNG) again, and touch Add account.  
2、To remove an email account:  
      Touch Email, press![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/0-111115142052.PNG) , touch Accounts, touch and hold the email account to be removed,and touch Remove account.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/01-111115142105.PNG)
